name: OR_LOG_ANESTH_QUAL
description: The OR_LOG_ANESTH_QUAL table contains OR management system log anesthesia qualifiers.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log the anesthesia qualifier refers to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the anesthesia qualifier in the surgical log.

columns.name: ANESTH_QUALIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which represents the anesthesia qualifier in the surgical log.
